title: Upvote this Lee Sin complaint thread
body:
Because I have not read the fact Riot is nerfing this champion, noticed his high pickrate, and I am constantly beating a dead horse and getting a lot of ignorant people to upvote my thread because they are like the regular mob who does not read any news or updates or have any self-thought rather than viewing threads that sate their self-interest.

So please, upvote this thread.

Because obviously there isn't enough crying on the boards about Lee Sin and Yasuo already.

Talk about actual issues like the fact people kill potatoes to make your fries. Sheesh.

replies.body:
>Talk about actual issues like the fact people kill potatoes to make your fries. Sheesh.

I'm going to have to use this insult more. Thank you sir.

Actually potatoes fill no vital roll in the plants long term needs, if anything we help ut. Whether you remove them from the plant manually or not, that tato will detach on its own. 

After that the tato is already dying as it consumes all of the starch it is built of (they r energy storage sacs essentially, almost pure sugar). So whether it becomes fries or rots, it will still die.
Well we should let it rot, so it doesn't get wasted.
Better, load it into a spud gun and shoot lee sin mains

removing potato from plants is like doing liposuction on humans (ignoring the aesthetic effect).
Plants need calories from potato to survive when it cant get sunlight.
Humans need calories from belly/flabs to survive when they cant get food.

n obviously plants dont need _all_ the potatoes it grew during spring~fall to survive thru winter
Don't worry. I shall save 1 potato from dying! *caresses computer*

You see, the problem is that the horse _just won't DIEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEE._

http://i.imgur.com/fl8q9QM.gif?NOREDIRECT
Final episode this Saturday.
I can't wait. Hopefully it's an hour-long special.
He has point and click hard CC, what were they smoking to think that was fair.
Ryze? Renek? Annie? Fiddle? Heca? Need more?
That was a joke, thought this was in memes and games for a second.

What happens if people stopped talking about Lee Sin? If everyone just decided to keep their distaste for the champion to themselves and didn't talk about the issues around the champion? Would the boards and the game be in a better place?
You stink.

Ahh I apologize my man, I took it as though you were trying to defend the lee sin complainers. 100% my bad.

It would be nice if we more *actual* gameplay discussions instead of "nerf X champ plox!!1!!1" or "buff my champ plox!1!?!1" posts. And to be clear, I'm talking about those posts where that's *all* they say, or they hide behind 1 statistic to hold their argument. Not the *legitimate* ones that have at least a paragraph explaining their reasoning and ideas on how to adjust X champ.
If people stop talking about him, he disappears forever.

Revive the horse
 Then kill it again 
  Then cut it up into chunks 
    and sell it to consumers through Tesco 
     labelling it as beef...

I don't really know why I'm here... 
{{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}

to be honest... lee sin is not so strong , his kit is just complicated and he has way to  many escapes..
(no i am not  lee main)
HIs kid being Yasuo I am guessing?.

hahahaha xD sorry  wrong letter xD 
KIT*
Either Boards Feedback or Memes.
good arguement. i see your point. yes. good post. good read. i now understand that lee sin is broken and why. i am so glad you made this.

Flowchart:

Is Lee nerfed yet? No? Post Lee Sin complaint thread.

Did Lee finally get nerfed? Yes? Done.
Should I upvote for the satire, or downvote because I thought about this a day after they dropped these changes onto the PBE?
DEATH TO THE STARCHY ONES!!
Im fine with potatoes dying. I love me some french fries and mashed potatoes.
His pickrate is huge but winrate is balanced cuz it is hard to master champ, very popular in low elo.. Lee sin show us the real power at msi, Peanut 14 kills its insane xd
Upvote this sarcastic, asinine  "gameplay is a joke" thread.
